text: Mbe Fhe Bakɨme phorga nzuav mba khesharigi suambarar ana muuŋgim, mbe mba wari fugap ki phen, ana mbe khɨgap nɨɨŋkui. Mba phen mbe khɨgap nɨɨŋkuim, Fhe Bakɨmen Ŋina Ŋaar zav, mbe givav, mbe rugim, mbe Fhe Bakɨme buni vhuuiŋ bun nzuai. Mbe khaŋ tɨgap Fhe Bakɨme buni bun vhuuiŋ bun nzuav, mbe rɨvi fhu.
